column5: I just missing hugging friends.
I consider wherever my friends are to be my home. I had to leave because of my BPD. I am hoping to go back one day. But when I'm really upset I do say and think about wanting to go home.
I am looking forward to visiting my best friend. I just really miss them and having fun together.

Metroid Fusion for sure.
I really love the story and atmosphere, samus has serious surgery and loses her normal suit forever. The changed controls from super metroid are a dream. You get to explore the world without worrying about getting lost. You are told where to go, but not how to get there.
Sex isn't a requirement for a romantic relationship. It really just depends on the people involved and what they want.
Kids deserve better.
This looks pretty terrible.
I took a picture of how I take a nap in my chair today. https://i.imgur.com/4myVrk6.jpg
Thank you so much!
It was a name I liked the sound of, and I could see myself being ok with it as an old woman.
Do you know the artist of the drawn one?
I can't wait to see my best friend again. It's gonna be the best day ever.

It's between AM2R and Fusion. I always want more 2D metroid games. The metroid-like genre is so tiny, I try not to play the metroid games too often so they stay fun for me. 

I really hope they don't bring back the counter attack in the next 2D game, that really slowed the game down for me in Samus Returns.
I would say they are inbetween comfortable and uncomfortable. But I would say that about most heels.
Thanks, I just got them a few days ago.

I realized about 2 weeks ago. I'd always hated that sleeping with someone was a euphemism for sex. Sleeping with someone always sounded more intimate and nice. And for some months now I've often really identified a lot with asexuality, but I could still see me potentially have sex at some point in a relationship. Then two weeks ago I was reading up on asexuality and found out about demisexual, and then it just kinda clicked. I was cuddling with my best friend like the next day, and I just felt like this was much nicer than sex could possibly be.
Last night my best friend and I were talking about us cuddling. We don't have sexual feelings for each other.
anyone know the artist?
Now I just need to figure out how to go about getting my gender marker changed. I was unlucky to be born in kansas but never lived there.
Oof, that's far. I'm in Georgia.
If we lived close by each other I'd be up for it. I'd only warn you I am very shy and anxious.
I'm not insecure of my height at 6'4, but I have always wanted to date a girl taller than me. I've always wanted to know what it feels like to be the short one on date at least once.
I just started going braless about a month ago. I was pretty scared at first cause my nipples are pointed no matter what. But nothing bad has happened, so I'm just never gonna wear bras again.
I knew about that with the creator, I just hadn't seen this specific one before so I thought maybe there was consensus on one of the many lesbian flags.
Was another lesbian flag made recently? I've been seeing this one suddenly in the past week or so.
I wear a double venus necklace so it's easier for other women to know.
